Module neidische.narwale.hp
Package gamelogic

Class Effects

java.lang.Object
gamelogic.Effects
public class Effects extends Object
The class Effects contains all effects of the board element activation and of the robot
Author:
Hannah Spierer, Tim Kriegelsteiner
